title: Complexity of sustainable trajectories of a socioecological system. An application of the wayfinder guide in the tropical andes (Colombia)
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 156

Author(s): Verónica Marrero, Daniela Baena, Linda Berrío-Giraldo, Clara Villegas-Palacio, Lina Berrouet, Driss Ezzine–De-Blas
